title: Kyrie Speaks Out, CMC Takes Over
description:
Welcome back to (debatable) with hosts Pablo Torre and Domonique Foxworth featuring Bill Barnwell and Spencer Hall! On today’s show: What do you make of Kyrie Irving's press conference and the Nets' slow start? Did Christian McCaffrey’s performance change how you view the 49ers’ offense? Which team that we’ve been ignoring do you think is more worthy of our respect: the Vikings or the Titans? Did you learn more about the Seahawks or the Giants today? Should we blame DJ Moore for the Panthers’ loss to the Falcons? Plus, Tennessee is onto Georgia after beating Kentucky and Lane Kiffin beefs with Jimbo Fisher!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): How Much Better Does CMC Really Makes The 49ers?
